summary: This document is an email from Jeffrey Epstein to Jes Staley discussing the need for additional staff for travel and preparation work. Epstein suggests that Staley should schedule extensive world travel and hire at least two more people to assist him. The email emphasizes the importance of this staffing for effective operations.

persons.name: Jeffrey Epstein
persons.context: Epstein is advising Jes Staley on staffing needs for travel and preparation work.

persons.name: Jes Staley
persons.context: Staley is the recipient of Epstein's email regarding travel and staffing recommendations.

connections.description: Epstein is providing advice to Staley regarding travel and staffing.

keyFacts: Epstein suggests that Staley should schedule a week of world travel.
Epstein recommends hiring at least two additional staff members for travel preparation.
The email contains a confidentiality notice indicating it may be attorney-client privileged.
